PIN.values: |// Efficiently calculate the cross-blend weights for each sample.&cr;&lf; // Let the unblurred sample to small blur fade happen over distance&cr;&lf; // d0, the small to medium blur over distance d1, and the medium to&cr;&lf; // large blur over distance d2, where d0 + d1 + d2 = 1.&cr;&lf; // dofLerpScale = float4 ( -1 / d0, -1 / d1, -1 / d2, 1 / d2 );&cr;&lf; // dofLerpBias = float4( 1, (1 – d2) / d1, 1 / d2, (d2 – 1) / d2 );|
|// dofEqFar.x and dofEqFar.y specify the linear ramp to convert&cr;&lf; // to depth for the distant out-of-focus region.&cr;&lf; // dofEqFar.z is the ratio of the far to the near blur radius.|

PIN.pinname: Blurred version of the shrunk sampler

LINK.dstpinname: Blurred version of the shrunk sampler
